text: Yeom Hye-ran (born 1976) is a South Korean actress. == Career == Yeom began her career in theater in 1999 and made her screen debut in 2003. She has since played supporting roles in film and television, notably Dear My Friends (2016), I Can Speak (2017), Life (2018), When the Camellia Blooms, Chocolate (2019-2020), and Innocent Witness (2019). ==Filmography== ===Film=== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- !
